0.title: Dafi hand and nail perfume cream
0.description:
• Deodorizing and softening the skin, strengthening and nourishing the skin with fast absorption and without causing weight on the skin
  • Increase, resistance and strength of nails and prevent fragility, layering and dryness of the skin around the nails
  • Contains Eucerin, beeswax, aloe vera extract, almond oil, argan, shea butter and vitamins B3 and B5.
